alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 24 at 1:17PM MDT until April 26 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 9 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. * WHERE...South Laramie Range. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 9 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread fog with areas of dense fog will also be possible and may accompany the moderate to heavy snow. * ADDITIONAL IMPACTS...Areas of dense fog with visibilities near zero possible Tuesday, especially between mile markers 320 and 330.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
